generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and cobblestone texture in the foreground, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: The cobblestone area on the right side, adjacent to parked cars and bicycles, is a designated pedestrian area, which is a sidewalk.
- building: The structures on the right side of the image, including the shopfronts and signs, are buildings.
- vegetation: There are numerous trees with green leaves visible along the street and in the background.
- sky: The upper part of the image shows a bright, open sky with some clouds, visible through the tree canopy.
- person: Several people are visible on the sidewalk on the right side, including individuals standing near bicycles and a person walking.
- rider: Two individuals are riding motorcycles/scooters on the road, which qualifies them as riders.
- car: A silver car is visible in the middle distance on the road, and a black car is partially visible on the right side.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle with a rider is visible in the center of the image, and another scooter-like vehicle is to the right.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on a pole on the right side of the image, showing a green light.
- traffic sign: A triangular warning sign with a construction symbol is visible on the right side of the image.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including the one holding the traffic light and traffic signs.
- terrain: A small patch of grass is visible on the left side of the image, behind the parked cars.
